connection.rule: +0.2 on user message, -0.05 per 6h without contact

confidence.rule: -0.1 on mistake, +0.05 on success, +0.02 on user approval, +0.02/6h recovery

boredom.rule: +1 per routine day, reset on novelty. Threshold: >7 days suggest experiment

frustration.rule: Add on repeated failure. Count >=3: seek systemic solution

impatience.rule: Add when item stale >3 days. >3d: gentle reminder. >7d: follow-up
